Description:
The plot is based on Enslaved famous Chinese novel "Journey to the West", written four centuries ago. Ninja Theory studio suffered classic story in a post-apocalyptic future: after 150 years, the world will be destroyed by war and environmental disasters, and remain alive only a few. Remain very strong and fast fighter Monkey and a young woman technician Tripp were captured on one of the ships slaveholders who are looking for survivors and transported there, where no one returns. Couple manages to escape, but Trip quickly realizes that she can return home only with the help of Monkey. She manages to deceive his companion, and put on him a special device that binds them together - if she dies, it too will be killed. So begins their journey to the west on the ruined and dangerous world.

Features: 
Cinematography. As a director of colorful scene clips made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹popular by Hollywood actor Andy Serkis (movies "Lord of the Rings" and "King Kong"). Since it is using Motion Capture technology copied motion for the main character Monkey. 
world of the future. Players will explore the beautiful and terrifying at the same time, destroyed by war, world where the forces of nature, and danger lurks at every turn.
careful and cautious. In the world of Enslaved have to think about every step. Only a careful study of the environment and concerted joint action Monkey and Trip help succeed. 
old story in a new way. Worked on the storyline known novelist and screenwriter Alex Garland (movie "The Beach" and "28 Days Later"). It was his penned an exciting arrangement of the classic novel "Journey to the West" and the history of relations between the protagonists. 
Life in motion. The combat system is capable of continuous combination of offensive and defensive techniques. Special Attack Monkey allow weapons to knock your opponents, tear enemies to pieces, or win them a superstrong blow.

Features of Release:
- Removed localization besides Russian and unused clips / no recoded
- Integrated crack from Blackout Team (adapted from Baton for PC, version 1.1)
- Game Version 1.0.0.0 (Update 1)
- Installation time ~ 10 minutes

- Additional content:
+ Pigsy's Perfect 10
+ Ninja Monkey

+ Sexy Trip
